name: Rooting 4 U
description:
Global Game Jam 2023 Submission:

https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/rooting-4-u-4

To root for someone is to show support or cheer someone up. This game is about a light-hearted blue square root cheering up a boy by collecting square roots of numbers. As the boy is struggling with Maths homework about square roots, this square root is "rooting" for him.

Install instructions:
Download and install Processing 4 (https://processing.org/download).
Open "RootingForYou.pde", click the play button.
